Content.Text:
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
C'mon, Big Sis! You're taking waaaay too long!
At this rate, somebody else will come in and
snatch him away from you!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yikes! I-I don't want that to happen. But I don't
have any idea what I'm supposed to do.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>! Are you here to ask my sister
on a date?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Of course she'd love to go out with you! Right,
Big Sis?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha? Now? B-but...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, see? She said yes!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
H-hey! Melanie!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Now, girls have lots of things to do to get ready
for dates, so would you please wait outside for a
minute, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Geez, Big Sis! Act like that and <MYNAME>
might start thinking something's wrong!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>When he asks you out, smile and say "Sure! I
was just thinking I wanted to go on a date with
you, <MYNAME>!"
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You have to do at least that much!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I-I couldn't do that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Now what am I supposed to do? What do
people talk about on dates? Should I change?
Ohmigosh, do I have anything to wear?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Just talk to <MYNAME> like you always do. And
I think it'll be okay if you wear what you have on
now.
<PAGE>
Really, I'd like to help you put on something
super cute to make him even more in love with
you...
<PAGE>
...But after what we said, taking the time to find
just the perfect outfit feels like it'd be trying too
hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>I-I can't do this! Going on a date with
<MYNAME> is too much. I'll die of
embarrassment!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
C'mon, Big Sis. If you keep thinking like that,
you'll never be able to go on a date your whole
life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>I know that! But...Ah! I know! Come with me,
Melanie. Please! You've got to!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Geez. What a sister I have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay. I'll go with you. But just this once, and
only if <MYNAME> says he doesn't mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Promise me that, next time, you'll go on a date
with him all by yourself, though!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I-I'll try, Melanie. Thank you so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi, <MYNAME>! Sorry to make you wait so long.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Actually, my sister told me she isn't feeling all
that well.
<PAGE>
Is it okay if I come along, too, so I can be there
if something happens? Just in case.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's not so bad that she needs to lie down or
anything.
<PAGE>
Besides, she told me getting to be with you will
make her feel way better than just taking a nap!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Melanie!!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh, right. Um, I-I'm feeling okay, I guess. But
would you mind too much if Melanie came
along, too?
Sure! She can come.
I'd rather it be just us.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Whew...!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
N-nothing! It's nothing! Anyways, let's go!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahahaha! <MYNAME>, you're so much fun! ♪ 
<PAGE>
Sometimes, I think you're too good for my
sister. Oh, I know! <MYNAME>, how about you
ditch Sis and go out with me!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>NO! YOU CAN'T!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
YEEP?! O-oh my gosh, I'm so sorry! I-I don't
know what came over me...!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! I was just kidding, Sis! I know
<MYNAME> is your Prince Charming.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmph!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm really sorry for insisting on
being a third wheel on your date today, but I had
a lot of fun! Thanks!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Um, I-I had fun, too! Thanks. I, um, I-I'm glad
you asked me.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Bye-bye, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, Melanie. I really appreciate it.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're welcome.
<PAGE>
We're lucky <MYNAME> is such a nice person.
But next time, try to go on a regular date
together with him, okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>I...I'll try.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yeah! By the way, Big Sis.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>What is it, Melanie?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Your score for that date is 3 out of 10.
<PAGE>
Keep acting like that and <MYNAME> will give
up on you in no time. You've got to do better!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Okay...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha?! B-but, um, i-it might be, uhh, r-really bad
for my health if--

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wait, no, I'm not feeling so sick that I might die
or anything, but that's not the point!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Umm... A-anyways, right now I just can't go
alone with you, I'm sorry!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It looks like my sister's condition took a turn for
the worse, so I'm afraid you two will have to
cancel the date.
<PAGE>
As her little sister, please let me apologize to you
for how she acted. I'm sorry, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I should go and give her a good scolding--
er, I mean, some good medicine and help her to
bed. See you later, <MYNAME>.
